hero_sub: Processed entirely in your browser. No file uploads.
card_local_desc: Files are converted in the browser, not uploaded to a server.
card_fast_desc: No waiting. Convert and download instantly.
faq_q1: Are my files stored on a server?
faq_a1: No. Everything runs locally in your browser; nothing is stored.
faq_a2: Core features are free. Some advanced options may be paid later.
tool_desc: Runs in your browser only. No server storage.
jpg2pdf_desc: Combine multiple images into a single PDF. Everything runs locally in your browser.
jpg2pdf_hint: Tip: Select images in order to generate pages in that order.
